1 - Find all affects relationships
assign a1, a2;
Select <a1, a2> such that Affects(a1, a2)
4 7, 6 7, 7 7, 7 10, 1 9, 2 8, 8 8, 9 9, 13 13, 14 14, 15 15, 14 18, 15 17, 16 18, 17 19, 18 20, 21 28, 22 30, 24 29, 25 25, 25 30, 26 26, 26 28, 28 28, 29 29, 30 30, 31 36, 32 36, 32 37, 34 37, 36 39, 37 39, 31 41, 36 41, 34 41, 34 42, 32 42, 37 42, 41 41, 42 42, 31 43, 36 43, 32 44, 37 44, 31 45, 32 46, 41 46, 42 46, 43 46, 44 46, 31 47, 32 48, 45 47, 46 48, 47 49, 48 50, 16 13,17 15,17 17,18 14,18 18,24 24,29 24,31 49,32 50,36 46,37 46,39 45,4 10,47 36,47 41,47 43,47 45,47 47,48 36,48 37,48 42,48 44,48 46,48 48    
5000
2 - Find all affects* relationships
assign a1, a2;
Select <a1, a2> such that Affects*(a1, a2)
4 7, 6 7, 7 7, 1 9, 2 8, 4 10, 7 10, 8 8, 9 9, 13 13, 16 20, 14 14, 15 15, 14 18, 14 20, 15 19, 15 17, 16 18, 17 19, 18 20, 21 28, 22 30, 24 29, 25 25, 25 30, 26 26, 26 28, 28 28, 29 29, 30 30, 31 36, 32 36, 32 37, 34 37, 31 39, 32 39, 34 39, 36 39, 37 39, 31 41, 36 41, 34 41, 34 42, 32 42, 37 42, 41 41, 42 42, 31 43, 36 43, 34 44, 32 44, 37 44, 31 45, 32 46, 41 46, 42 46, 43 46, 44 46, 31 47, 32 48, 45 47, 46 48, 47 49, 48 50, 16 13,16 14,17 15,17 17,18 14,18 18,24 24,29 24,31 37,31 42,31 44,31 46,31 48,31 49,31 50,32 41,32 43,32 45,32 47,32 49,32 50,34 36,34 43,34 45,34 46,34 47,34 48,34 49,34 50,36 36,36 37,36 42,36 44,36 45,36 46,36 47,36 48,36 49,36 50,37 36,37 37,37 41,37 43,37 45,37 46,37 47,37 48,37 49,37 50,39 36,39 37,39 39,39 41,39 42,39 43,39 44,39 45,39 46,39 47,39 48,39 49,39 50,41 36,41 37,41 39,41 42,41 43,41 44,41 45,41 47,41 48,41 49,41 50,42 36,42 37,42 39,42 41,42 43,42 44,42 45,42 47,42 48,42 49,42 50,43 36,43 37,43 39,43 41,43 42,43 43,43 44,43 45,43 47,43 48,43 49,43 50,44 36,44 37,44 39,44 41,44 42,44 43,44 44,44 45,44 47,44 48,44 49,44 50,45 36,45 37,45 39,45 41,45 42,45 43,45 44,45 45,45 46,45 48,45 49,45 50,46 36,46 37,46 39,46 41,46 42,46 43,46 44,46 45,46 46,46 47,46 49,46 50,47 36,47 37,47 39,47 41,47 42,47 43,47 44,47 45,47 46,47 47,47 48,47 50,48 36,48 37,48 39,48 41,48 42,48 43,48 44,48 45,48 46,48 47,48 48,48 49,6 10
